metadata.title: CVE-2017-9054 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue, also known as DW201703-002, was discovered in libdwarf2017-03-21. In _dwarf_decode_s_leb128_chk() a byte pointer was dereferencedjust before it was checked for being in bounds, leading to a heap-basedbuffer over-read.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-9054` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

dwarfdump - 20180129-1
libdwarf1 - 20180129-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dwarfutils package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '20180129-1').
